3.1. cnclient¶

3.1.1. Module d1_client.cnclient¶

This module implements CoordinatingNodeClient, which extends DataONEBaseClient with functionality specific to Coordinating Nodes.

Created:

2011-01-22
Author:

DataONE (vieglais, dahl)
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

Classes
